original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has approved the recommendation of the Constitutional Council of the new members of the Public Service Commission.

The Chairman is retired senior SLAS officer Jayantha Ediriweera. The other  six  members are Siththi Marina Mohamed, Narasinghe Herath Mudiyanselage Chitrananda, Prof. Naganathan Selvakkumaran, Manikka Badathuruge Rohana Pushpakumara, Dr. Angampodi Damitha Nandani De Soysa, Ranjini Nadarajapillai and Pallegama Chandraratne Pallegama.
